overview.summary:
The Gradient module computes the derivative of a scalar field and converts it to a vector field. The gradient is the derivative of three dimensions; the first component in the X direction, the second component in the Y direction, and the third component in the Z direction grid, computing the general direction of "flow" at a specific point on the geometry.
At this time, LatVolMesh and tetVolMesh are the only SCIRun supported Fields accepted by the Gradient module. The Gradient module has no GUI. If Gradient recieves as input a Field type it does not support, an error message appears in the Error frame of the SCIRun environment.
